message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $8,500?
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I would like to propose a price of $8,800 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
